resources.string: Location service allows map and other application(s) to retrieve your location details via GPS
Let Google use your location to improve search results and other services
Allow Google\'s location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running.\nTo adjust this setting, go to Settings > Location services
Monitoring apps for security and privacy

Data traffic protection will remind you when your data plan has reached its limit to avoid exceeding your data plan.
Please input your data plan limits.
If you have not applied for a data package, it is recommended to turn off data usage. Otherwise, carrier may charge you additional fees.
